name: The blood red skirt of Lucifer
data: It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom too much.
It has average armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'mastery of medicine'.
It affects the skill mastery of medicine.
